TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaUnique extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaIdentityConstraint

summary.span: 按 WWW 联合会 (W3C) 指定的方式显示 来自 XML 架构的元素。

span.span: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

summary.span: 此类可用于标识一组元素中的唯一约束。

span.span: This class can be used to identify a unique constraint among a set of elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定属性或元素值（或者属性或元素值的组合）在指定范围内必须是唯一的。Specifies that an attribute or element value (or a combination of attribute or element values) must be unique within the specified scope. 约束名称必须是在架构中是唯一的。The constraint name must be unique within a schema. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`XmlSchemaUnique`类。The following example shows the use of the `XmlSchemaUnique` class. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaUnique Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaUnique Example/CPP/unique.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaUnique Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaUnique Example/CS/unique.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaUnique Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaUnique Example/VB/unique.vb#1)] 为此代码示例生成下面的 XML 文件。The following XML file is generated for this code example.
